title: PyCon 2009: Internet Programming with Python (Part 1 of 3)
description:
Internet Programming with Python (part 1 of 3)

Presented by Wesley J. Chun

This tutorial introduces current Python programmers to 3-4 distinct
areas of Internet programming, each in self-contained (approximately)
1-hour lectures (unless otherwise noted) with a demonstration of code on
each lecture topic.
